newsitem.title: MEXICO: RESEARCH ALERT - Telmex buy reiterated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Telmex buy reiterated.

text.p: Salomon Brothers reiterated its buy rating on Mexican telephone company Telefonos de Mexico SA (Telmex), the brokerage said in a statement on Thursday.
Analyst Sari Mayer said Telmex has fared well in the long-distance pre-subscription process. The analyst also said new rates in the competitive market do not appear to be leading to a price war.
